channel.title: [PI] Admins don't get NPC drops
channel.description:
Right I'm having a problem, Player rights 3 and 4 do not get drops from NPCs, they also don't get a killcount at godwars. I've had a look in config.java and can only seem to see Admins rights to trade, drop etc...
Any help please?

item.title: [PI] Admins don't get NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @A_New_LIght A New LIght
item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

Just glad I could help you had me stumped for a second :o

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Admins don't get NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @ProximityPlus ProximityPlus
item.description:
@ProximityPlus wrote:

[quote=“A New LIght, post:4, topic:420073”][quote author=ProximityPlus link=topic=522632.msg3801085#msg3801085 date=1320016036]

look for this in npchandler

see if it is stopping that player right.

				if (c.playerRights == 0 || c.playerRights == 1
						&& c.memberStatus <= 2) {
					dropItems(i); // npc drops items!
					}

Could this be the problem? If so what do I change it too?
[/quote]just delete everything except the dropItems(i);[/quote]

You sir are an absolute legend!

Read full topic
